title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5102.7 - Eligibility to work in the United States
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5102.7 - Eligibility to work in the United States

State Regulations

No natural person shall be employed as a video lottery
gaming agent unless such person is a citizen of the United States or is
otherwise eligible to work in the United States. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5102.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
